FuncDef: The display eva register-strategy command displays policy registration information about a script. The display eva register-strategy command displays policy registration information about a script.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an EVA script.
The value is a string of 2 to 31 case-sensitive characters, starting with a letter and containing only digits, letters, and underscores (_). It cannot contain spaces.
The file name extension of an EVA script in Python format is .py.The .json file name extension is not required for an EVA script in JSON format.
